# Config

## Disable update

```
	GUI>Perferences>Settings-User>
	
	// Settings in here override those in "Default/Preferences.sublime-settings",
	// and are overridden in turn by file type specific settings.
	{
		"update_check": false,
		"ignored_packages": []
	}


	$ cat /etc/hosts
	127.0.0.1       localhost
	127.0.0.1       www.sublimetext.com	

```
